text: The Tragedy of Coriolanus is a play by William Shakespeare. It is a tragedy. Shakespeare's source was Plutarch's Life of Caius Martius Coriolanus. It was probably was first acted between 1607 and 1608. It was probably first printed in 1623 in the First Folio.Coriolanus ==References== Category:Plays by William Shakespeare Category:1600s plays
title: Coriolanus
